securityPolicy.name: SECURITY POLICY
securityPolicy.title: Only you can access your data. Not us—Not anyone else.
securityPolicy.description:
Uncompromising Data Privacy: Your Information, Your Control.

At Paxform, safeguarding your data is our utmost priority. We never share your data with anyone, and rest assured, no one at Paxform can view or access your information. Our mission is to apply end-to-end encryption to every piece of stored data, ensuring the protection of organizations and individuals at all costs.

With Paxform, you have full control over who can view specific pieces of information. Our security architecture decentralizes personal data, minimizing the risk of exposing any information in the event of a security threat. You can have full confidence in our commitment to preserving your privacy.

testimonial.name: TESTIMONIAL
testimonial.title: What people are saying about Paxform

getStarted.title:
Get started for free.
Download on your mobile device.
getStarted.cardTitle1: We’d love to hear from you!
getStarted.cardDescription1: Feel free to get in touch with us. Our team can help you design a personalized package that meets your specific needs. With our advanced technology, your data will be automatically synced across all forms, eliminating the need for tedious manual input.
getStarted.cardDescription2: Experience straightforward and transparent billing free from hidden charges with Paxform.
getStarted.cardDescription3: Leverage our robust API capabilities to effortlessly connect and synchronize with other systems.

hero.title:
Forms
Made Digital
hero.description: Protect your information with Paxform's secure personal data management. Save and access your data with ease for quick document signing and effortless information sharing with other users.

businessPlatform.name: BUSINESS PLATFORM
businessPlatform.title: Your business information at your fingertips
businessPlatform.platformTitle1: Create and customize forms to send to customers effortlessly
businessPlatform.platformTitle4: Exclusive Forms: Tailored for Employees and Restricted Locations
businessPlatform.platformDescription1: Tailor forms to your organization's needs with Paxform's customizable features. Our extensive selection of standard and custom form fields allows you to mold each form to your liking.
businessPlatform.platformDescription2: Instantly receive auto-completed electronic forms from your customers upon submission. Say goodbye to waiting for hard copies to arrive as our platform eliminates this common issue.
businessPlatform.platformDescription3: Say goodbye to tedious and time-consuming forms. With Paxform, even the most comprehensive forms that require extensive information can be completed in an instant. Expect quicker and more efficient form submissions.
businessPlatform.platformDescription4: You may require subjective forms strictly for employees or specific locations. These separate functions are readily made available to your organization for your utmost convenience. Rest assured that all the hard work has already been taken care of for you!

personalPlatform.name: PERSONAL PLATFORM
personalPlatform.title: Your personal information at your fingertips
personalPlatform.platformTitle1: Capture, save and use personal data to complete forms and applications
personalPlatform.platformTitle2: Link and share data with family
personalPlatform.platformDescription1: The personal data you provide is captured securely within the app after a single use, ensuring its safe storage for future use across any form, at any time. With automatic saving, each time you complete a form, new information is integrated and readily available for your convenience.
personalPlatform.platformDescription2: Link accounts with family members to effortlessly share personal data, eliminating physical information exchange. Experience simplified form filling for secondary identities, automatically filling the required data for the respective individual.
personalPlatform.platformDescription3: Manually filling physical forms is a tedious, time-consuming task. Experience the sheer efficiency of Paxform, where even the most extensive forms demanding every detail about you are effortlessly and instantaneously completed.
personalPlatform.platformDescription4: The personal data you submit is captured after one use and stored safely in the app for future use—any time, any form. New information is saved automatically as you complete each form.
personalPlatform.platformDescription5: Experience elevated confidence as you conveniently use previously stored signatures to electronically sign your documents effortlessly.

simplicity.title: We simplify your work
simplicity.cardTitle1: Centralize Your Information: Everything You Need in One Place
simplicity.cardDescription1:
Say goodbye to the hassle of searching for scattered information. With Paxform, you can conveniently store all your important data, from biodatas and signatures to documents and contacts, in a single app.

What's more, rest assured that all your data is encrypted, ensuring that only you and the intended recipients have access to it.
simplicity.cardDescription2:
Manual form completion is not only time-consuming but also prone to typos and form abandonment, leading to unnecessary delays. Complicating matters further, studies show that nearly 30% of individuals struggle with understanding basic forms.

With Paxform, you can bid farewell to repetitive data entry. Simply input your information once, and it will automatically populate across all forms. Eliminate the hassle of manually filling in the same data repeatedly.

hero.title: Experience a Seamless Form Creation Process for Your Organization
hero.description: Experience the ultimate ease in form creation with Paxform. Our transition from physical to digital forms revolutionizes your user interactions, providing a reliable and efficient process to gather data for the benefit of your team and users alike. Our web application empowers you with straightforward functions and features, paving the way for your success on the road ahead.

flexbox.heading: Paper work was yesterday - Go digital today
flexbox.text: Eliminate the lengthy process of administrative rework while leaving no environmental footprint.

first.title: Create Forms
first.description: At Paxform, creating forms is our specialty. Our web application provides your team with a user-friendly interface, saving time and ensuring your forms are visually appealing and well-organized. We've made the form creation process incredibly easy, eliminating the need for coding or advanced design skills. With our standard and custom form fields, you can customize your forms to suit your organization's preferences.

second.title: Create Contracts
second.description: By utilizing Paxform, the realm of digital data sharing and submissions is revolutionized, surpassing conventional expectations for contract creation. Similar to standard forms, contracts incorporate both standard and customizable fields, enabling your organization to tailor contracts to your specific requirements

third.title: View and Process Submissions
third.description: Experience the convenience of centralized submission management with Paxform. Our user-friendly web application prioritizes simplicity and order, empowering your organization with a comprehensive suite of features and functions. Gain complete control over your submissions, effortlessly view and process the data your organization receives, all from a single platform.

fourth.title: Manage Checkins/visitors
fourth.description: Recognizing the challenges posed by disorganized visitor management, we have integrated Checkins as a key feature in our mobile application. By offering Checkin forms to visitors upon entry to your physical facilities, you not only promote Covid-19 prevention measures but also facilitate customer follow-ups, gather valuable reviews, and provide timely notifications about organizational updates and offers. Experience seamless visitor management with Paxform.

fifth.title: Chat with Customers
fifth.description: Enhance communication between your organization and its users with our integrated chat function. This powerful feature breaks down common communication barriers and ensures seamless interactions. Take control of the conversation by initiating the chat, enabling users to engage with your organization.

content.title: Privacy Policy
content.description:
(“Products”) care about how their information is collected, used, processed, transferred, stored, and shared. This Global Privacy Policy describes Bynder’s commitment to protecting your privacy. It forms a part of our Website Terms of Use, Trial Terms of Use, and Standard Termsof Service, and all other documents incorporated therein (“Terms”). Any capitalized terms not defined in this Global Privacy Policy are defined as set out in the Terms.

Please familiarize yourself with this Global Privacy Policy. This Global Privacy Policy is formally reviewed annually and is updated as often as necessary. Updates will be posted public on the Website. If we make substantive changes to the purposes and policies set out here, we will update this page and we will inform Product Users by email or in-application notification.

This Global Privacy Policy provides information on how Bynder handles data as a data controller, meaning all data we process for our own purposes. Where Bynder is a processor or asub-processor of data, that activity is generally governed by a Data Processing Agreement.

This Global Privacy Policy provides information on how Bynder handles data as a data controller, meaning all data we process for our own purposes. Where Bynder is a processor or asub-processor of data, that activity is generally governed by a Data Processing Agreement.

first.heading: 1. What We Collect and How We Use It
first.description: This Global Privacy Policy provides information on how Bynder handles data as a data controller, meaning all data we process for our own purposes. Where Bynder is a processor or a sub-processor of data, that activity is generally governed by a Data Processing Agreement.

second.heading: 2. Personal Data Retention and Security
second.description: Data security is a matter of critical importance. Bynder uses a wide range of security measures to safeguard your data against unauthorized access and disclosure and we continually evaluate our security program to ensure its effectiveness. Amazon Web Services provides our servers and maintains them in high-security controlled environments pursuant to the  AWS Cloud

third.heading: 3. Your Data and Your Rights
third.description:
As a general matter, depending on local data protection laws, you have rights that may include:

  • Clear information on our processing of your Personal Data;
  • Access your Personal Data that we hold, together with the right to have inaccuracies corrected;
  • To have your Personal Data delivered to you in a standard electronic format;
  • To object to our processing of your Personal Data, and to prevent solely automated decision making or profiling; and
  • To restrict our processing of your Personal Data, or have your Personal Data deleted.

hero.name: PERSONAL
hero.title: Fill Any Form, Anywhere with Your Personal Information All in One Place
hero.description: Paxform simplifies form filling with its powerful autofill technology. Save time and effort by eliminating the repetitive task of entering personal information. With Paxform, you can securely manage and store all your personal data in one place, electronically sign important documents, and effortlessly send them to organizations. Rest assured, your data is fully encrypted for enhanced security and privacy.

flexBox.title: Tired of Repeatedly Filling Forms with the Same Data Requirements?
flexBox.description: Save your valuable time by having access to all your information on demand. Autocomplete forms and applications on the go. Fill your data once and let our system handle the rest.

planSection.name: PERSONAL PLANS
planSection.title: Choose a Plan That’s Right for You

features.description1: Once you start entering your personal information into the folio, instant access to that data becomes available at your fingertips. What's more, all your saved information is automatically populated into any relevant forms, eliminating the tedious task of repeatedly entering required details in multiple places. Thanks to Paxform's streamlined structure, editing and saving data is a breeze, providing users with a hassle-free form-filling experience.
features.description2: Paxform has transformed form filling by seamlessly transitioning from paper to digital forms, enabling you to effortlessly complete forms anytime, anywhere. Unlike traditional physical forms, Paxform's advanced digital technology eliminates the frustration of lengthy and disorganized paperwork, converting the form-filling process into a smooth and automated experience. With just a scan or a click, you can now fill forms on the go, at your convenience. Bid farewell to the stress of dealing with physical forms and embrace a smoother and more convenient form-filling journey.
features.description3: Upon form submission, you gain access to a user-friendly chat function, facilitating easy communication between you and the organization receiving your form. This convenient feature enables both parties to address any potential issues or concerns regarding the provided data. Additionally, you can direct any personal questions or concerns to the organization, ensuring effective and timely interaction throughout the process.
features.description4: Paxform now offers two powerful features: 'Add a Person' and 'Link & Share.' These functions empower users to invite family members and securely share data with trusted recipients. Rest assured, your data remains protected through advanced encryption and robust security measures, ensuring that only the intended recipient can access it. Sharing data with family members simplifies the form-filling process, especially when entering information related to a shared identity, as many forms require this level of detail.
features.description5: Our Secrets feature goes beyond your folio, granting you exclusive access to highly sensitive information like your bank card and bank account details. To ensure utmost confidentiality, single-factor authentication is mandatory for viewing and modifying this data. Additionally, the Secrets page offers a convenient random password generator, generating robust and dependable passwords for your security. Furthermore, you'll have the ability to utilize the Shared Secrets function, enabling you to securely share your confidential data with trusted users already connected to your account.
features.description6: Enhance your understanding of your shared information with the powerful Disclosures feature. Access a comprehensive list of organizations you've engaged with through Paxform and effortlessly explore the forms you've filled for each specific organization. Stay in control of your interactions by utilizing this function, which efficiently organizes your form history and provides valuable insights into your engagements with various organizations.

hero.name: ABOUT US
hero.title: Paxform for everyone
hero.description: Paxform’s function is simple: it completely fills any form, anytime. You can manage and save your personal data, allowing you to sign documents and send them to organisations with ease. No need to worry about security and privacy—Paxform fully encrypts your data to ensure your safety.

vision.name: Our Vision
vision.title: Forms without forms.
vision.description: Paxform’s function is simple: it completely fills any form, anytime. You can manage and save your personal data, allowing you to sign document s and send them to organisations with ease. No need to worry about security and privacy—Paxform fully encrypts your data to ensure your safety.

diversity.title: Diversity & Inclusion
diversity.description:
At Paxform, we make diversity and inclusion part of everything we do. We are building a culture where one’s unique attributes and differences are part of who we are. Regardless of background or gender, our employees, customers and stakeholders are treated as equals.

As a fast-growing company, we focus on creating a diverse workforce globally and a workplace that welcomes, nurtures and celebrates camaraderie, initiative, leadership and innovation. We strive to build innovative products that can be used by everyone despite their cultural, language or geographic differences, furthermore, achieving the goals that we have set for ourselves and our stakeholders.

legalPage.title: Paxform Legal
legalPage.description: Find legal information and resources for our products and services, including our policies and terms.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.slogan: Only You Can Access Your Data. Not Us - Not Anyone Else.
dataSecurity.description:
Paxform will never share your data with anyone. What’s more, no one at Paxform can view or access your information. Our mission is to apply end-toend encryption to every piece of information stored, protecting the data of organizations and individuals at all stages and at all costs.

Only you decide which parties can view what piece of information. Our security architecture ensures that personal data is decentralized, guaranteeing that the point of access in a potential security threat will not reveal any information.

dataAccess.slogan: Only You Can Access Your Data. Not Us - Not Anyone Else.

dataSafeguard.title: Safeguarding your data
dataSafeguard.description: From the very first brainstorming stages to launch, security is an integral aspect of every step in our development processes.

dataSecurity.title: Secure anywhere anytime
dataSecurity.description: From the very first brainstorming stages to launch, security is an integral aspect of every step in our development processes.
